heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed 
Payment Notice and Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021. 
(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 12th day of April

title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: 4. The provisions specified in column (2) of Schedule 1, each of which is
text_raw:
4. The provisions specified in column (2) of Schedule 1, each of which is 
a penal provision for the purposes of section 31A of the Act of 1947, are 
prescribed to be fixed penalty provisions and the amount specified in column 
(3) of that Schedule, opposite a fixed penalty provision, is prescribed as the 
fixed payment in respect of the fixed penalty provision concerned. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th April, 2021.

title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: 5. Regulations 6(1) and 9(1) of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
5. Regulations 6(1) and 9(1) of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 168 of 2021), 
being penal provisions for the purposes of section 31A of the Act of 1947, are 
prescribed to be dwelling event provisions.

title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations revoke the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and 
Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 536 of 
2020), as amended. These Regulations provide for certain penal provisions in 
Regulations made under Section 31A of the Health Act 1947 to be fixed 
penalty and/or dwelling event provisions.
